statements: UPDATE spectral_signatures SET spectral_values = '0.85, 0.91, 0.76, 0.82' WHERE signature_id = 1;
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET collection_date = '2023-07-15', last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET collection_date = '2022-07-15', last_updated = NOW(), spectral_values = '{0.26, 0.49, 0.63, 0.78, 0.91}' WHERE signature_id = 101
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, land_cover_type = 'Urban Area', wavelength_range = '400nm - 700nm' WHERE collection_date = '2021-12-10'
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET spectral_band_1 = 0.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remote_sensing_analysis SET classification_result = 'Forest' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET spectral_band_1 = 0.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remote_sensing_analysis SET analysis_date = '2022-10-15', classification_result = 'Forest' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE spectral_signatures SET spectral_values = '{"B1": 0.5, "B2": 0.3, "B3": 0.6}' WHERE signature_id = 1;
UPDATE land_cover_types SET land_cover_name = 'Forest' WHERE type_id = 2;

signature_id
land_cover_type
: 'Forest'}' WHERE signature_id = 1;

UPDATE spectral_signatures_land_cover_types SET spectral_intensity = 0.75, spectral_wave_length_range = '500-600 nm' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE land_cover_categories SET description = 'Vegetation types including forests, grasslands, and wetlands' WHERE land_cover_category = 'Vegetation';
